DOC.detailed_description: Preeclampsia ( PE ) still lead cause fetal maternal morbidity mortality incidence 3-5 % worldwide . Despite intensive research effort pathogenesis disease still unknown likely multifactorial.Clinical risk factor traditionally use identify woman high risk develop preeclampsia , biophysical factor may help predict hypertensive disorder pregnancy.In addition , change serum concentration angiogenic antiangiogenic factor imply pathogenesis PE possible relevance diagnosis disease .
